be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util.commandLine

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util.commandLine.Command

  • public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to create simple String commands that are able to fire a specific method.
    Author:
    Thibault Helsmoortel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Command(java.lang.String command, java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Package local constructor specifying command and method.
      protected Command(java.lang.String command, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object... args)
      Package local constructor specifying command, method and optional args.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object execute()
      Fires the method linked to the command along with the previously set argument(s), if any.
      java.lang.String getCommand()
      Returns the actual name of the command.
      boolean isExecuted()
      Returns true when the command was executed, false if otherwise.
      void setArgs(java.lang.Object[] args)
      Set the argument(s) to be passed to the executed method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
